contest-event.event-date:
April 26, 2014 D British Open Spring Festival (Grand Shield) British Open Spring Festival (Grand Shield) 10 Test Piece Contest British Open Spring Festival grand-shield Winners back to 1952 are as engraved on the current Grand Shield trophy. Except for 1981 to 1984 where the bands on the trophy appear to have come second, not first! Was a different trophy given to the winners? If you know the answer please let us know.

There are also results on the trophy from 1902 to 1938, but they are for the Crystal Palace Contest (see link at top of page). On Alderley Edge Winter Gardens (Opera House Theatre), Blackpool, Lancashire, England, UK First Prize: £800 and Grand Shield Second Prize: £600 Third Prize: £400 Fourth Prize: £300 First Half Draw: 9.30am Start: 10.30am May 12, 2013, 5:10 p.m. April 29, 2014, 2:11 p.m. 1 Flowers Band Paul Holland 2 Hammonds Saltaire Morgan Griffiths 3 Whitburn Band Ian Porthouse 4 Reg Vardy Band Stephen Roberts 5 Tongwynlais Temperance Band Jeremy Wise 6 Rothwell Temperance Band David Roberts 7 Marsden Silver Prize Band Glyn Williams 8 City of Hull Band Alan Morrison 9 Thoresby Colliery Brian Grant 10 Woodfalls Band Nicholas Childs 11 Northop Band Thomas Wyss 12 Burry Port Town Nigel Seaman 13 Aldbourne Band David Johnson 14 Pemberton Old Wigan DW Band Stig Mærsk 15 Unite the Union (City of Sheffield) David Hirst 16 Redbridge Brass Alan Duguid 17 Newstead Brass Duncan Beckley 18 Yorkshire Imperial Brass Band Mark Bentham 19 Jaguar Land Rover Band Dave Lea Withdrawn Beaumaris Band Unknown Withdrawn BTM Band Unknown Withdrawn TCTC Group Band Jef Sparkes
